attributes.action: limit all employees hours to a maximum 40 hours per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are currently working in excess of 50 hrs per week, thus eroding any family time which in turn affects the cohersion of the family unit.  By limiting the working week to a maximum of 40hrs per week employers will in turn have to employe more people thus reducing the number of people that are claiming unemployment benefits
